Virgo Framework Route Function

Creating a Response Route

create a function with a request parameter. Return a Respone and link the function to routes.

                    
# apps/sample/routes.py

from virgo.core.routing import routes
from virgo.core.response import Response, redirect
from virgo.core.template import render


def my_page(request):
    return Response("This is my testing page")
routes["/page"] = my_page

Import app's Route

                    
# virgo.py

import apps.sample.routes

Run the Server

You should see "This is my testing page" in /page route

                    
# terminal

py virgo.py lightserve
